name: Alien Invasion Free
description:
Defend your space station against wave after wave of evil aliens!

Incredibly creepy aliens and loads of weapons breathe excitement into a favorite classic. Catch the power-ups to upgrade your weapons system and teach the invading aliens a lesson. Clear each level before moving on to the next. This game is filled with super fun retro arcade action!

The FREE version of Alien Invasion contains 10 full levels to play!

Features:

* 10 amazing levels
* 5 types of weapons
* High-scores table
* Super addicting game-play
* Retro arcade action
* Cool soundtrack

Compatibility:

* iPhone
* iPod Touch
* iPad
